rows.label: qev041311_MSG0001
rows.name:
No matter how many many Miralife Card packs I buy,
I never find a gold nopopotamus card, do I?
...Do they even exist?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041311_MSG0002
rows.name: Another miss? Mmm. So very very disappointing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041311_MSG0003
rows.name:
Um, hello? You wouldn't happen to have the silver
mortifole card I've been looking for, would you?
I could trade you a...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041311_MSG0004
rows.name: Oh. So so sorry. It seems I have...nothing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041311_MSG0005
rows.name:
Or I could maybe give you this brand-new Ma-non
hunting kit I just invented? That's a fair trade, isn't it?
Anyway, do you happen to have the card?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041311_MSG0010
rows.name:
Yahoo! Mortifoles are just the best, don't you think?
You almost WANT one to eat you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041311_MSG0011
rows.name:
Oh, but we had a deal, didn't we? Right then.
Here is your new best best friend in the field,
a Ma-non hunting kit. I hope you like it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041311_MSG0012
rows.name:
Oh, but please don't take the name literally and use it
to hunt Ma-non, okay? Otherwise, please enjoy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041311_MSG0013
rows.name: No, no! That's okay. Sorry to...bother you?[ST:wait ]
